prod_long_desc:
Build the TNT cannon and wage battle against the fearsome wither and wither skeletons that protect the nether fortress! Enjoy hands-on Minecraft™ adventures featuring your favorite characters and objects with this LEGO® Minecraft set—designed for young fans of the highly successful sandbox video game. Includes a Steve minifigure, plus a wither and 2 wither skeletons.
Includes a Steve minifigure, plus a wither and 2 wither skeletons.
Put on your iron armor, grab your bow and prepare for battle.
Look out for the wither skeletons with their stone swords.
Build the TNT cannon and open fire on the nether fortress!
The nether fortress includes a tumbling wall function.
Accessory elements include Steve’s armor and helmet, 2 blocks of TNT, fire, nether quartz ore and nether wart.
Weapons include Steve’s bow and 2 swords.
Fold out the set to create more rooms.
Set your imagination free—rebuild the set for more LEGO® Minecraft™ creations!
Includes more than 300 LEGO® bricks.
Measures over 3” high, 7” wide and 5” long.
